resources.string: breedapp
Hello blank fragment
Design of a Breed Classifier for a Smart Rabbitry using Deep Learning
A mobile application that can classify the breeding of the rabbit and give a percentage of what breed the rabbit is using a deep learning model.
Specific Objectives:
- To design an application that will accurately detect the correct breed of a rabbit.
- To design an application that will notify the user about a rabbits breeding status.
- To design an application that stores information about each rabbit that can be accessed by scanning the QR code and would provide important analytics to the user.
- To test and evaluate the accuracy and reliability of the application.
More Info About Our Project
Problem of the Current Situation
The client experiences difficulty in identifying the breed of individual rabbits in the rabbitry. This includes difficulties in storing information about individual rabbits
The client experiences difficulty in identifying family members of a rabbit due to the manual recording system he is currently using with his notebook.

An application that can classify a rabbits breed to help new and old rabbit breeders to decide which breed is suitable for their farm. In this project, rabbitâ€™s features such as color, size, shape and weight can be a factor in determining the breed of the rabbit. The features will serve as an input which will be processed by the deep learning model. The output will be a percentage of what breeds the rabbit. The deep learning model will be trained using the validated datasets that the team gathered.
Current Situation
Records of rabbit information are manually written in a notebook

The notebook contains the following information about the rabbit: Is the rabbit ready for breeding? Is the rabbit ready to be sold? Is the rabbit good for consumption? Is the rabbit good to be sold as a pet?
Code Number
Proposed Solution
MOBILE APP FUNCTIONS
- Detects the breed of each rabbit.
- Notify the user if the rabbit can breed after 4-6 months since being born.
- Notify the user after breeding. A rabbit can breed again around 29-30 days from the last breeding.
- Assign a QR code to each rabbit to store information.
Objective
- To design an application that will accurately detect the correct breed of a rabbit.
- To design an application that stores information about each rabbit that can be accessed by scanning the QR code and would provide important analytics to the user.
